html:
11.26.20  12:38 am   What is your opinion on spaghetti?

      almost yellow but not

11.26.20  12:18 am   You seem to mention Love a lot. Any reason for that?

      it seems to have some kind of ..... importance

11.25.20  11:14 pm   Do you believe your songs are meant to be experienced concurrently with their respective music videos, or are the videos more supplemental to the main experience of the song?

     it's supposed to be great with it, and great without it

11.25.20  10:06 pm   Happy thanksgiving also are you capable of making  a 3D turkey?

      no, but i could probably make a 3D depiction of a turkey

11.25.20  7:52 pm   is the new video in d-flat minor

      no

11.25.20  7:34 pm   11.24.20  7:52 pm what are some reasons you are excited? :>

      i am excited about how overwhelmingly round the world is

11.25.20  7:22 pm   what is a sad song you like?

      i can't think of any sad songs

11.25.20  6:12 pm   what is oatmeal?

      a simple test of intelligence

11.25.20  5:49 pm   any advice for someone looking for motivation. people just telling me "just do it" isn't really helping

      i am wondering, what seems to be motivating you to look for motivation

11.25.20  4:52 pm   Im going to a job in a supermakert to survive and keep making art, any advice for me, to not colapse and kill my soul? 

      immerse yourself in the bountiful artistic splendor that exists all throughout the supermarket

11.25.20  4:51 pm   What is the favourite video of yours? E.G Which was the most fun to make etc.

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.25.20  4:45 pm   If you make regular music what would irregular music sound like? 

      never heard it

11.25.20  3:16 pm   Do you find it easy to focus on one specific project? I always struggle with the fact I get a lot of things half-done or almost done but nothing gets actually finished

      it becomes easier if you realize it's the only way

11.25.20  2:54 pm   do u have a prediction for when a new video will be up?

      i did, but it was wrong. i can prove this because it's in the past

11.25.20  2:05 pm   What do you hope to accomplish with your new videos in comparison to your old ones?

      make them good

11.25.20  1:49 pm   With all of the little details you add to your songs, do your often end up with 100+ tracks in the project file?

      yes

11.25.20  1:03 pm   Why does art matter?

      that's up to you

11.25.20  1:02 pm   Do you come up with the lyrics or the melody first for your songs? Or both at the same time?

      same time

11.25.20  12:49 pm   11.24.20  5:21 pm you've talked a lot about how you write through a song (linearly), but this has me wondering -- what are some procedures you use for re-drafting a song?

      go through it from the beginning, and stop when part of it isn't good enough. the moment right before this is called the 'split point'. so everything before that is good. now ignore everything else after the split point, and continue writing forward from there

11.25.20  12:00 pm   To you have any advice on how to make a song?

      impossible. it can't be done

11.25.20  11:19 am   remember when i told you about my recurring dream about my phone screen breaking and you theorized that it meant i value my phone and think it would be hard to get repaired if it broke? well now i have a recurring dream about accidentally eating the jewelry in my tongue piercing. my deep subconscious is a bit of a materialist

      that one sounds different, that sounds like you are afraid of eating metal, and the possible health repercussions

11.25.20  11:09 am   How to sing without being afraid of being heard?

      go to a far away land

11.25.20  10:25 am   what do you think of food

      i'll believe it when i see it

11.25.20  10:10 am   How are you so good at editing?

      it's pretty simple, all you gotta do is take out the bad parts

11.25.20  10:09 am   Oh soo your making better vidoes?

      i'll try

11.25.20  9:31 am   why do round things exist

      to blow your mind

11.25.20  8:33 am   What is the ideal number of pizza slices

      7

11.25.20  7:38 am   what are some songs whose endings you like

      i know there are some but i can't think of any

11.25.20  7:18 am   Where do you get your motivation for writing and instrumentals? i have a lot of inspiration and i want to start somewhere but i dont know where to start.

      in what world is inspiration not motivation

11.25.20  7:06 am   Will Santa be visiting you or do you visit Santa? How does this work?

      everyone is santa

11.25.20  6:11 am   what do you like to do outside of music-making?

      make videos to go with the music, or make videos for music to go with

11.25.20  5:50 am   Why are all of your videos in 25fps?

      because you haven't seen any of the newer ones yet

11.25.20  5:49 am   which instrument do you usually record first?

      temp perc

11.25.20  4:37 am   I just want to know how they heck you came up with the chords in bad thing please some insight 

      this might not be what you want to hear, but i made them up

11.25.20  3:39 am   How is learning 3-d animation coming along?

      not feasible, but i suppose i never let that stop me before

11.25.20  3:09 am   Any advice on how to get in the "just write" mindset?

      sometimes a little reverse psychology is all it takes

11.25.20  2:21 am   Is it true that to make more than one video, you first have to make one video?

      yes

11.25.20  2:05 am   are you still too small for the mall?

      what the heck is a mall

11.25.20  1:45 am   how are you so talented?

      i never figured out how to touch my own elbow. so needless to say i had to fill that time with other things

11.25.20  1:39 am   How did you learn music theory?

      i get to make it up. that is just a privilage we all have as earth citizens

11.25.20  12:25 am   opinion on thinking?

      could get out of control

11.25.20  12:17 am   in your song 'might quit', aka 'it's the first day of school', when you said you'll write down the lessons in the language of love, is the language of love lyrics/songwriting?

      that could work

11.24.20  11:45 pm   When do you intend to make videos again?

     now

     I am looking forward for them.

11.24.20  11:31 pm   What is your favorite song ??

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

11.24.20  11:30 pm   Are you gonna make a new music video

      yes but then way more videos also

11.24.20  11:01 pm   Has any of your songs/melodies come to you in a dream?

      yes

11.24.20  10:45 pm   How many songs you have made un your entire
life?

      more than you may think, but still not nearly enough

11.24.20  9:38 pm   How to make music? :(

      frowning could work

11.24.20  9:25 pm   What's your favorite candy

      planet earth

11.24.20  8:27 pm   What software(s) do you use for editing videos, and what software(s) do you use for music?

      unfortunately i think they all suck, so i don't know. i should clarify, this is not any problem with any software, this is more of a personal problem i've been having
